greeting1: Hey you! What is this supposed to mean? Stop it this instance, or else!
pcTalk1: Huh? What? I did nothing wrong!
pcTalk2: Well, since there is no other way... Here you go.
npcTalk1: Look, I am willing to overlook this, but you will have to pay a fine of <fine> gold. Will you? If you don't, I am afraid I will have to use force.
